synopsis.text: Two brothers, Naoto and Naoya Kirihara, possess extraordinary psychic abilities that reside in the unused 70% of the human brain, a region known as 'Night Head.' Fearing their uncanny powers, their parents abandoned them, leaving them confined to a secluded laboratory within a protected forest. After a daring escape, the siblings embark on a journey to discover the world outside their prison. However, their newfound freedom comes with a price as they become entangled in a series of supernatural events that threaten to disrupt society. As the brothers struggle to control their formidable powers, they must confront their past and navigate a world that fears their very existence. Will their abilities prove to be a blessing or a curse, not only for themselves but for those around them? Join the Kirihara brothers as they embark on a thrilling adventure filled with danger, intrigue, and self-discovery in this captivating anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
